points.point: Obtained nontrivla bounds for projective dimension based on the minimal number of generators of an ideal.
Made extensive use of Macaulay2's MonomialOrbits and RandomMonomialIdeals packages.
Investigated properties of linearly presented primary monomial ideals.
Obtained structure results about such ideals in low dimension and applied results to hypergraphs and socle degree.
Visualized monomials using Python and tested conjectures relating to structural properties of such ideals.
